entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Southend Reindeer
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:25 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -25.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Southend 1:00 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023
Temperature: -25.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -30.7°C
Wind: NNE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
